availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mansel F. Drennan (Caldwell co., ky, farm laborer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of David J. Drennan and Margaret Drennan. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 292A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Farmersville, p. 143.
"Mansel Fieldon "Bid" Drennan (1838-1918)," Find A Grave, Memorial #53495387, accessed June 10, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/53495387.
